title: Orbifold Chern classes and Bogomolov-Gieseker inequalities
comment: This note is splitted from arXiv:2401.07273
summary: Assume that $X$ is a compact complex analytic variety which has quotient singularities in codimension 2, and that $\mathcal{F}$ is a reflexive sheaf on $X$. Using orbifold modifications, we can define first and second homological Chern classes for $\mathcal{F}$. If in addition $X$ has a Kähler form $ω$ and $\mathcal{F}$ is $ω$-stable, then we deduce Bogomolov-Gieseker inequality on the orbifold Chern classes of $\mathcal{F}$.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明了在具有商奇点的紧复解析簇上，ω-稳定的自反层满足Bogomolov-Gieseker不等式
AI.motivation: 研究具有商奇点的紧复解析簇上自反层的稳定性理论，将经典Bogomolov-Gieseker不等式推广到奇异情形
AI.method: 使用轨道形修改(orbifold modifications)定义自反层的第一和第二同调陈类，在Kähler形式和ω-稳定性条件下推导不等式
AI.result: 证明了在具有余维2商奇点的紧复解析簇上，ω-稳定的自反层满足轨道形陈类的Bogomolov-Gieseger不等式
AI.conclusion: 该方法成功将经典稳定性理论推广到具有商奇点的复解析簇，为奇异空间上的向量丛理论提供了新工具

title: Generalized K-theoretic invariants and wall-crossing via non-abelian localization
summary: Given an abelian category and a stability condition satisfying appropriate conditions, we define generalized $K$-theoretic invariants and prove that they satisfy wall-crossing formulas. For this, we introduce a new associative algebra structure on the $K$-homology of the stack of objects of an abelian category, which we call the $K$-Hall algebra. We first define $δ$-invariants directly coming from the stack of semistable objects and use the $K$-Hall algebra to take a formal logarithm and construct $\varepsilon$-invariants. We prove that these satisfy appropriate wall-crossing formulas using the non-abelian localization theorem. Based on work of Joyce in the cohomological setting, Liu had previously defined similar invariants assuming the existence of a framing functor; we show that when their definition of invariants makes sense it agrees with ours. Our results extend Joyce--Liu wall-crossing to non-standard hearts of $D^b(X)$, for which framing functors are not known to exist.

AI.tldr: 该论文在阿贝尔范畴和稳定性条件下定义广义K理论不变量，证明其满足壁交叉公式，引入K-Hall代数结构，并扩展Joyce-Liu的壁交叉理论到非标准心
AI.motivation: 扩展Joyce-Liu的壁交叉理论到更一般的阿贝尔范畴，特别是当框架函子不存在时，如D^b(X)的非标准心
AI.method: 在阿贝尔范畴的对象叠的K同调上定义新的结合代数结构（K-Hall代数），从半稳定对象叠直接定义δ-不变量，使用K-Hall代数取形式对数构造ε-不变量
AI.result: 证明了这些不变量满足适当的壁交叉公式，使用非阿贝尔局部化定理；当Liu的定义有意义时，证明其与本文定义一致
AI.conclusion: 成功将Joyce-Liu壁交叉理论扩展到框架函子不一定存在的情况，特别是D^b(X)的非标准心，建立了更一般的K理论不变量壁交叉公式

title: Divisorial fans and algebraic torus actions over arbitrary fields
summary: We provide a algebro-geometric combinatorial description of geometrically integral geometrically normal varieties endowed with an effective action of an algebraic torus over arbitrary fields. This description is achieved in terms of divisorial fans endowed with a Galois semilinear action. This work concludes the description of normal $T$-varieties over fields.

AI.tldr: 本文为任意域上具有代数环面有效作用的几何整几何正规簇提供了代数几何组合描述，通过带有伽罗瓦半线性作用的除子扇实现，完成了正规T-簇在域上的分类。
AI.motivation: 本文旨在完成正规T-簇在任意域上的完整描述。之前的工作可能只处理了代数闭域或特定域的情况，需要扩展到任意域并处理伽罗瓦作用的影响。
AI.method: 使用带有伽罗瓦半线性作用的除子扇来描述几何整几何正规簇。该方法将代数环面的有效作用与除子扇的几何结构相结合，并引入伽罗瓦作用来处理域扩张问题。
AI.result: 成功建立了任意域上具有代数环面有效作用的几何整几何正规簇的完整代数几何组合描述，通过带有伽罗瓦半线性作用的除子扇实现了这一目标。
AI.conclusion: 本文完成了正规T-簇在任意域上的完整描述工作，为研究代数环面作用的几何结构提供了统一的组合框架，解决了域扩张中的伽罗瓦作用问题。

title: Asymptotics of local height pairing
summary:
We discuss the asymptotics of the Archimedean part of the Arakelov intersection number. The theorem is motivated by recent conjectures and their proof strategy by Gao and Zhang on the Northcott property of the Beilinson--Bloch height pairing. Our method involves a homological algebra interpretation of the Archimedean height by Hain. This interpretation allows us to introduce motivic viewpoints using Deligne cohomology, cycle class maps and higher Chow groups.
  Especially, we compare the biextension by Hain and Brosnan--Pearlstein over $\mathbb{C}$ based on Poincaré line bundle and Hodge theory with the $\mathbb{G}_{\mathrm{m}}$-biextension of Bloch and Seibold defined by two families of homologically trivial cycles on a generically smooth family of projective varieties over a smooth curve. Our comparison, a relative version of the work of Gorchinskiy, enhances his derived viewpoint on these biextensions. Especially when the family of varieties are smooth, the two constructions are related via derived regulator maps to Deligne cohomology, reinterpreted similarly to Beilinson's absolute Hodge cohomology, as well as the derived description of Hardouin's biextension that generalizes Poincaré line bundle by Hain. The comparison when the family defined over a smooth curve has a strongly semistable reduction further involves a simple monodromy computation using mixed Hodge modules.
  Along our discussion, we simplify the discussion of Bloch and Seibold, partly in the style of Gorchinskiy. For example, the symmetry of their biextension is proved more easily than their work.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了Arakelov相交数的Archimedean部分的渐近性质，通过同调代数方法比较了不同双扩张构造，简化了Bloch和Seibold的工作。
AI.motivation: 该研究受到Gao和Zhang关于Beilinson-Bloch高度配对的Northcott性质的最新猜想及其证明策略的启发，旨在深入理解Archimedean高度的渐近行为。
AI.method: 采用Hain的Archimedean高度的同调代数解释，引入Deligne上同调、循环类映射和高阶Chow群的动机观点。比较了基于Poincaré线丛和Hodge理论的Hain与Brosnan-Pearlstein双扩张，以及Bloch和Seibold定义的𝔾ₘ-双扩张。方法包括相对版本的Gorchinskiy工作、导出调节映射到Deligne上同调，以及使用混合Hodge模的简单单值计算。
AI.result: 建立了不同双扩张构造之间的比较关系，特别是在光滑簇族情况下，通过导出调节映射到Deligne上同调建立了联系。对于在光滑曲线上具有强半稳定约化的族，通过混合Hodge模的单值计算进一步扩展了比较。简化了Bloch和Seibold的讨论，例如更简单地证明了他们双扩张的对称性。
AI.conclusion: 本文通过同调代数和动机方法深入研究了Archimedean高度的渐近性质，建立了不同双扩张构造之间的比较关系，并简化了现有理论框架，为理解Arakelov相交数的Archimedean部分提供了新的视角。

title: $U_q(\mathfrak{gl}(m|n))$ bounds on the minimal genus of virtual links
comment: 49 pages, 39 figures, comments welcome. Supplemental Mathematica notebook available at: https://github.com/micah-chrisman/virtual-knots/blob/main/prismatic_zh_final_switch.nb
summary: For links $L \subset Σ\times [0,1]$, where $Σ$ is a closed orientable surface, we define a $U_q(\mathfrak{gl}(1|1))$ Reshetikhin-Turaev invariant with coefficients in $\mathbb{Z}[H_1(Σ)]$. This invariant turns out to be equivalent to an infinite cyclic version of the Carter-Silver-Williams (CSW) polynomial. The importance of the CSW polynomial is that half its symplectic rank gives strong lower bounds on the virtual genus. Recall that the virtual genus of a virtual link $J$ is the smallest genus of all closed orientable surfaces $Σ$ on which $J$ can be represented by a link diagram on $Σ$. Here we generalize the CSW lower bound to all quantum supergroups $U_q(\mathfrak{gl}(m|n))$ with $m,n>0$. For $(m,n)=(1,1)$, the $U_q(\mathfrak{gl}(m|n))$ bound is the same as the CSW bound. However, changing the value of the pair $(m,n)$ can give lower bounds better than those available from other known methods. We compare the $U_q(\mathfrak{gl}(m|n))$ lower bounds to those coming from the CSW polynomial, the surface bracket, the arrow polynomial, hyperbolicity, and the Gordon-Litherland determinant test. As a first application, we show that the Seifert genus of homologically trivial knots in thickened surfaces is not additive under the connected sum operation of virtual knots. As a second application, we prove that the Jaeger-Kauffman-Saleur invariant of a virtual knot is always realizable as the Alexander polynomial of an infinite cyclic cover of a knot complement in some $Σ\times [0,1]$, but is not always so on a surface of minimal genus. This is accomplished with a generalization of the $Zh$-construction, called the homotopy $Zh$-construction.

AI.tldr: 该论文为曲面上的链环定义了U_q(gl(m|n))量子超群不变量，推广了CSW多项式，提供了虚拟亏格的新下界估计方法，并应用于虚拟结的连通和与Alexander多项式实现问题。
AI.motivation: 研究动机是改进虚拟链环的虚拟亏格下界估计方法。现有方法如CSW多项式、曲面括号、箭头多项式等提供的下界不够精确，需要更强大的工具来估计虚拟链环的最小表示曲面亏格。
AI.method: 方法包括：1) 定义曲面Σ×[0,1]上链环的U_q(gl(1|1)) Reshetikhin-Turaev不变量；2) 将该不变量推广到所有U_q(gl(m|n))量子超群；3) 发展同伦Zh构造来研究Alexander多项式的实现问题。
AI.result: 主要结果：1) U_q(gl(m|n))不变量提供了比现有方法更好的虚拟亏格下界；2) 证明了曲面中同调平凡结的Seifert亏格在虚拟结连通和下不满足可加性；3) 证明了Jaeger-Kauffman-Saleur不变量总可实现为某个曲面中无限循环覆盖的Alexander多项式，但未必在最小亏格曲面上实现。
AI.conclusion: 结论：量子超群U_q(gl(m|n))不变量为虚拟亏格估计提供了强大新工具，改进了现有下界，并揭示了虚拟结理论中Seifert亏格可加性和Alexander多项式实现的重要性质。

title: Resurgence and perverse sheaves
summary: We propose a point of view on resurgence theory based on the study of perverse sheaves on the complex line carrying an algebraic structure with respect to additive convolution. In particular, we lift the concept of alien derivatives introduced originally by J. Écalle, to the framework of perverse sheaves and study its behavior under sheaf-theoretic convolution. The full fledged resurgence theory needs a (yet undeveloped) generalization of the concept of perverse sheaves allowing infinite, possibly dense, sets of singularities. We discuss possible approaches to defining such objects and some potential examples of them coming from Cohomological Hall Algebras, wall-crossing structures and Chern-Simons theory.

AI.tldr: 将复现理论（resurgence theory）与带有加法卷积代数结构的复直线上反常层（perverse sheaves）联系起来，提升Écalle的外来导数概念，并讨论向无穷奇点集推广的可能性。
AI.motivation: 建立复现理论与反常层理论之间的联系，为复现理论提供新的几何视角和代数结构框架。
AI.method: 研究复直线上带有加法卷积代数结构的反常层，将Écalle的外来导数概念提升到反常层框架，并探讨其在层论卷积下的行为。
AI.result: 提出了基于反常层的复现理论新观点，成功将外来导数概念推广到反常层框架，并讨论了向无穷奇点集推广的可能性。
AI.conclusion: 反常层理论为复现理论提供了有力的几何框架，但需要发展允许无穷奇点集的新反常层概念，这在与Cohomological Hall Algebras、wall-crossing结构和Chern-Simons理论相关的潜在例子中具有应用前景。

title: Involutions on S^4
summary: This paper studies locally linear involutions on S^4. Our main theorem shows that any such involution with a 1-dimensional fixed-point set is necessarily linear, provided the fixed-point set admits an equivariant tubular neighborhood. The proof combines modified surgery theory with an equivariant version of the Schoenflies theorem, which we establish here. We also show that equivariant tubular neighborhoods of 1-dimensional fixed-point sets, when they exist, are not unique, in contrast to the nonequivariant case. Our results combine with earlier work to provide a classification of all locally linear involutions on S^4. As a further application, we obtain that strongly negative amphichiral knots with trivial Alexander polynomial are equivariantly topologically slice with respect to the linear action, strengthening a previous result of the first two authors. Finally, we also prove that when the fixed-point set is 2-dimensional, the involution is linear if and only if the fixed-point set is an unknotted 2-knot.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了S^4上的局部线性对合，证明了具有1维不动点集的对合在线性化条件，建立了等变Schoenflies定理，并最终完成了S^4上所有局部线性对合的分类。
AI.motivation: 研究S^4上局部线性对合的分类问题，特别是具有1维不动点集的对合是否必然线性，以及等变管状邻域的存在性和唯一性问题。
AI.method: 结合改进的surgery理论和等变版本的Schoenflies定理（在本文中建立），分析等变管状邻域的性质，并应用于对合的分类。
AI.result: 证明了具有1维不动点集的局部线性对合在存在等变管状邻域的条件下必然是线性的；发现等变管状邻域不唯一；完成了S^4上所有局部线性对合的分类；证明了具有平凡Alexander多项式的强负amphichiral纽结相对于线性作用是等变拓扑可切的。
AI.conclusion: 本文解决了S^4上局部线性对合的分类问题，建立了等变Schoenflies定理，揭示了等变管状邻域的非唯一性，并将结果应用于纽结理论，深化了对高维对合和等变拓扑的理解。

title: Degeneration of the archimedean height pairing of algebraically trivial cycles
summary: We consider the limiting behaviour of the archimedean height pairing for homologically trivial algebraic cycles in a degenerating one-parameter family of smooth projective complex varieties. We conjecture that the limit is controlled by the non-archimedean geometric height pairing of the cycles on the generic fiber and verify this for algebraically trivial cycles, assuming a conjecture of Griffiths on incidence equivalence. Our work offers a more geometric understanding of a related asymptotic result of Brosnan--Pearlstein and suggests a new perspective on the positivity of the Beilinson--Bloch height pairing over a one-variable complex function field.

AI.tldr: 研究退化单参数族中代数循环的Archimedean高度配对的极限行为，猜想该极限由一般纤维上的非Archimedean几何高度配对控制，并在代数平凡循环情形下验证了该猜想。
AI.motivation: 探索退化单参数族中代数循环的Archimedean高度配对的极限行为，为理解Brosnan-Pearlstein相关渐近结果提供更几何的解释，并为单变量复函数域上Beilinson-Bloch高度配对的正性提供新视角。
AI.method: 考虑光滑射影复簇的单参数退化族，研究同调平凡代数循环的Archimedean高度配对的极限行为。假设Griffiths的关联等价猜想，在代数平凡循环情形下验证猜想。
AI.result: 提出了关于Archimedean高度配对极限行为的新猜想，并在代数平凡循环情形下验证了该猜想（假设Griffiths猜想成立）。为相关渐近结果提供了更几何的理解。
AI.conclusion: 退化单参数族中代数循环的Archimedean高度配对的极限行为可由一般纤维上的非Archimedean几何高度配对控制，这为理解高度配对的正性提供了新视角。

title: Panhandle polynomials of torus links and geometric applications
summary: We use a decomposition of the tensor of the fundamental representation of the quantum group $U_q(\mathfrak{sl}_N)$ and the Rosso-Jones formula to establish a peculiar ``panhandle'' shape of the HOMFLY-PT polynomial of the reverse parallel of torus knots and links. Due to their panhandle-like intrinsic properties, the HOMFLY-PT polynomial is referred to as a ``panhandle polynomial''. With the help of the $\ell$-invariant, this extends to links the Etnyre-Honda result about the arc index and maximal Thurston-Bennequin invariant of torus knots. It has further geometric consequences, related to the braid index, the existence of minimal string Bennequin surfaces for banded and Whitehead doubled links, the Bennequin sharpness problem, and the equivalence of their quasipositivity and strong quasipositivity. We extend these properties to torus links, which relate to the classification of their component-wise Thurston-Bennequin invariants. Finally, we discuss the definition of the $\ell$-invariant for general links.

AI.tldr: 论文利用量子群表示分解和Rosso-Jones公式，建立了反向平行环面结/链环HOMFLY-PT多项式的"平底锅"形状特性，并由此推导出多个几何不变量和拓扑性质。
AI.motivation: 研究反向平行环面结/链环的HOMFLY-PT多项式特性，探索其特殊的"平底锅"形状，并将Etnyre-Honda关于弧指数和最大Thurston-Bennequin不变量的结果推广到链环。
AI.method: 使用量子群U_q(sl_N)基本表示的张量分解和Rosso-Jones公式，结合ℓ-不变量的帮助，分析反向平行环面结/链环的HOMFLY-PT多项式结构。
AI.result: 发现了HOMFLY-PT多项式的"平底锅"形状特性，推广了Etnyre-Honda结果到链环，获得了关于辫指数、最小弦Bennequin曲面存在性、Bennequin锐度问题以及拟正性与强拟正性等价性的几何推论。
AI.conclusion: 反向平行环面结/链环的HOMFLY-PT多项式具有独特的"平底锅"形状，这一特性揭示了多个重要的几何和拓扑性质，并为一般链环的ℓ-不变量定义提供了理论基础。

title: Wall-crossing for invariants of equivariant 3CY categories
summary: We provide a wall-crossing framework for operational enumerative invariants of equivariant 3-Calabi--Yau categories arising from virtual cycles. The strategy follows ideas of Joyce's ``universal'' wall-crossing framework arXiv:2111.04694, using the authors' symmetrized pullback technique to preserve the symmetry of the (almost-perfect) obstruction theories throughout. As an application, we define and study wall-crossings of simple type between operational equivariant Donaldson--Thomas (DT), Pandharipande--Thomas (PT), and Bryan--Steinberg (BS) vertices. In particular, we give an explicit DT/PT descendent vertex correspondence in the Calabi--Yau limit. As another application, we construct and prove wall-crossing formulas for operational refined semistable Vafa--Witten invariants.

AI.tldr: 该论文提供了一个用于等变3-Calabi-Yau范畴操作枚举不变量的壁交叉框架，应用包括DT/PT顶点对应和精炼Vafa-Witten不变量的壁交叉公式。
AI.motivation: 研究等变3-Calabi-Yau范畴中操作枚举不变量的壁交叉行为，特别是Donaldson-Thomas、Pandharipande-Thomas和Bryan-Steinberg顶点之间的对应关系，以及精炼Vafa-Witten不变量的壁交叉公式。
AI.method: 采用Joyce的"通用"壁交叉框架思想，使用作者的对称化拉回技术来保持（几乎完美）阻碍理论在整个过程中的对称性。
AI.result: 定义了简单类型之间的操作等变DT、PT和BS顶点的壁交叉，给出了Calabi-Yau极限下的显式DT/PT后裔顶点对应，并构造并证明了操作精炼半稳定Vafa-Witten不变量的壁交叉公式。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为等变3-Calabi-Yau范畴的操作枚举不变量提供了一个系统的壁交叉框架，在Donaldson-Thomas理论和Vafa-Witten理论中具有重要应用。

title: Delta-Unknotting Number for Two-Bridge Knots
summary: The $Δ$-unknotting number for a knot is defined as the minimum number of $Δ$-moves needed to deform the knot into the trivial knot. We determine the $Δ$-unknotting numbers for two-bridge knots of type $C(2β_1, 2β_2, ... , 2β_n)$ and type $C(2β_1, 2β_2, ... , 2β_{n-1}, 2β_n-1)$, where $β_i$ is a positive integer for $1 \leq i \leq n$. We also discuss two-bridge knots whose $Δ$-unknotting number is equal to one.

AI.tldr: 本文确定了两种特定类型二桥结的Δ-解结数：C(2β₁, 2β₂, ..., 2βₙ)和C(2β₁, 2β₂, ..., 2βₙ₋₁, 2βₙ-1)类型，并讨论了Δ-解结数为1的二桥结。
AI.motivation: 研究结理论中的Δ-解结数问题，特别是针对二桥结这类重要结类，旨在建立Δ-移动与结不变量之间的精确关系，为结的复杂性度量提供新工具。
AI.method: 使用二桥结的连分数表示法，分析C(2β₁, 2β₂, ..., 2βₙ)和C(2β₁, 2β₂, ..., 2βₙ₋₁, 2βₙ-1)两种特定类型的结构特性，通过组合数学和结理论方法计算Δ-解结数。
AI.result: 成功确定了上述两种类型二桥结的精确Δ-解结数，并识别出所有Δ-解结数为1的二桥结，建立了这些结的代数表示与拓扑性质之间的对应关系。
AI.conclusion: 本文为二桥结的Δ-解结数提供了系统性的计算结果，揭示了Δ-移动与结的连分数表示之间的深刻联系，为进一步研究结的等价变换复杂度奠定了基础。

title: Lê modules and hypersurfaces with one-dimensional singular sets
summary: By using our previous results on Lê modules and an upper-bound on the betti numbers which we proved with Lê, we investigate the cohomology of Milnor fibers and the internal local systems given by the vanishing cycles of hypersurfaces with one-dimensional singular sets.

AI.tldr: 研究具有一维奇异集超曲面的Milnor纤维上同调及由消失循环给出的内部局部系统
AI.motivation: 研究具有一维奇异集超曲面的Milnor纤维上同调性质，利用先前关于Lê模的结果和与Lê证明的Betti数上界
AI.method: 使用先前关于Lê模的结果和与Lê证明的Betti数上界，研究Milnor纤维上同调和由消失循环给出的内部局部系统
AI.result: 对具有一维奇异集超曲面的Milnor纤维上同调和内部局部系统进行了深入分析
AI.conclusion: 通过Lê模理论和Betti数上界，成功研究了具有一维奇异集超曲面的Milnor纤维上同调和内部局部系统

title: Vietoris thickenings and complexes of manifolds are homotopy equivalent
summary: We show that if $X$ is a finite-dimensional Polish metric space, then the natural bijection $\mathrm{VR}(X;r)\to \mathrm{VR^m}(X;r)$ from the (open) Vietoris-Rips complex to the Vietoris-Rips metric thickening is a homotopy equivalence. This occurs, for example, if $X$ is a Riemannian manifold. The same is true for the map $\mathrm{\check{C}}(X;r)$ to $\mathrm{\check{C}}^\mathrm{m}(X;r)$ from the Čech complex to the Čech metric thickening, and more generally, for the natural bijection $\mathrm{V}(\mathcal W)\to \mathrm{V^m}(\mathcal W)$ from the Vietoris complex to the Vietoris metric thickening of any uniformly bounded cover $\mathcal W$ of a finite dimensional Polish metric space. We also show that if $X$ is a compact metrizable space, then $\mathrm{V^m}(\mathcal W)$ is strongly locally contractible.

AI.tldr: 对于有限维波兰度量空间，Vietoris-Rips复形与其度量加厚之间的自然双射是同伦等价，Čech复形与其度量加厚之间也是如此。对于紧致可度量空间，度量加厚是强局部可收缩的。
AI.motivation: 研究度量空间的拓扑性质，特别是比较不同构造（如Vietoris-Rips复形和Čech复形）与其度量加厚版本之间的拓扑等价性，这对于拓扑数据分析(TDA)和几何拓扑学具有重要意义。
AI.method: 通过分析有限维波兰度量空间的性质，证明自然双射是同伦等价。特别关注Riemannian流形等具体例子，并扩展到紧致可度量空间的强局部可收缩性。
AI.result: 证明了对于有限维波兰度量空间，Vietoris-Rips复形到其度量加厚的自然双射是同伦等价，Čech复形到其度量加厚的自然双射也是同伦等价。对于紧致可度量空间，度量加厚是强局部可收缩的。
AI.conclusion: 这些结果为拓扑数据分析提供了重要的理论基础，表明在某些条件下，度量加厚构造保留了原始复形的拓扑性质，这对于实际应用中的计算和理论分析都具有重要意义。

title: q-Opers and Bethe Ansatz for Open Spin Chains I
summary: In in a nutshell, the classical geometric $q$-Langlands duality can be viewed as a correspondence between the space of $(G,q)$-opers and the space of solutions of $^L\mathfrak{g}$ XXZ Bethe Ansatz equations. The latter describe spectra of closed spin chains with twisted periodic boundary conditions and, upon the duality, the twist elements are identified with the $q$-oper connections on a projective line in a certain gauge. In this work, we initiate the geometric study of Bethe Ansatz equations for spin chains with open boundary conditions. We introduce the space of $q$-opers whose defining sections are invariant under reflection through the unit circle in a selected gauge. The space of such reflection-invariant $q$-opers in the presence of certain nondegeneracy conditions is thereby described by the corresponding Bethe Ansatz problem. We compare our findings with the existing results in integrable systems and representation theory. This paper discusses the type-A construction leaving the general case for the upcoming work.

AI.tldr: 该论文将几何q-Langlands对偶扩展到开放边界条件的自旋链，引入反射不变的q-oper空间，并与Bethe Ansatz方程建立对应关系。
AI.motivation: 经典几何q-Langlands对偶建立了(G,q)-opers空间与XXZ Bethe Ansatz方程解空间的对应关系，但仅限于闭边界条件。本文旨在研究开放边界条件自旋链的Bethe Ansatz方程的几何对应。
AI.method: 引入反射不变的q-oper空间，其定义截面在选定规范下关于单位圆反射不变。在非退化条件下，该空间由相应的Bethe Ansatz问题描述。本文专注于A型构造。
AI.result: 建立了反射不变q-oper空间与开放边界条件自旋链Bethe Ansatz方程的对应关系，并与可积系统和表示论中的现有结果进行了比较。
AI.conclusion: 成功将几何q-Langlands对偶扩展到开放边界条件情形，为理解开放边界自旋链的Bethe Ansatz方程提供了几何框架。一般类型的情况将在后续工作中讨论。

title: Asymptotics aspects of Teichmüller TQFT for generalized FAMED semi-geometric triangulations
summary: We introduce a generalized FAMED property for ideal triangulations of hyperbolic knot complements in $\mathbb{S}^3$. Given a hyperbolic knot $K$ in $\mathbb{S}^3$ and a semi-geometric triangulation $X$ of $\mathbb{S}^3 \setminus K$ that is generalized FAMED with respect to the longitude. We prove that in the semi-classical limit $\hbar \to 0^+$, for any angle structure $α$, the partition function $\mathscr{Z}_\hbar(X,α)$ in Teichmüller TQFT decays exponentially with decrease rate the volume of $\mathbb{S}^3 \setminus K$ equipped with a hyperbolic cone structure determined by $α$, and that the 1-loop invariant of Dimofte-Garoufalidis emerges as the 1-loop term. With additional combinatorial conditions on the triangulations, we prove the existence of the Jones function and show that its decay rate is governed by the Neumann-Zagier potential function. In particular, the Andersen-Kashaev volume conjecture holds for every hyperbolic knot whose complement admits such kinds of triangulations.

AI.tldr: 该论文引入广义FAMED性质来研究双曲扭结补空间，证明在Teichmüller TQFT中配分函数在经典极限下以双曲体积指数衰减，1-loop项对应Dimofte-Garoufalidis不变量，并在特定三角剖分条件下证明了Andersen-Kashaev体积猜想。
AI.motivation: 研究双曲扭结补空间的量子拓扑性质，特别是Teichmüller TQFT配分函数在经典极限下的渐近行为，以及如何通过理想三角剖分建立与双曲几何的联系。
AI.method: 引入广义FAMED性质描述理想三角剖分，使用半几何三角剖分和角度结构，分析Teichmüller TQFT配分函数在ℏ→0⁺极限下的渐近展开，并建立与Neumann-Zagier势函数的关系。
AI.result: 证明配分函数以双曲锥结构体积指数衰减，1-loop项为Dimofte-Garoufalidis不变量；在特定三角剖分条件下Jones函数存在且衰减率由Neumann-Zagier势函数控制，从而证明了Andersen-Kashaev体积猜想对这类扭结成立。
AI.conclusion: 广义FAMED三角剖分为研究双曲扭结的量子拓扑性质提供了有效框架，建立了Teichmüller TQFT与双曲几何的深刻联系，并证明了Andersen-Kashaev体积猜想对一大类双曲扭结成立。

title: On the Non-Semipositivity of a Nef and Big Line Bundle on Grauert's Example
summary: We study the relation between semipositivity, nefness, and bigness of line bundles on compact Kähler manifolds. Every nef and big line bundle on a compact Kähler manifold $X$ is positive when ${\rm dim}\,X = 1$. Kim constructed an explicit example of a nef and big line bundle that is not semipositive in the case ${\rm dim}\,X \ge 3$. Motivated by a conjecture of Filip and Tosatti, we then focus on the case of dimension two. In this talk, we show that the line bundle on Grauert's example is nef and big but not semipositive, by explicitly computing its first obstruction class, which was originally introduced by Koike as a generalization of the Ueda class.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了紧致Kähler流形上线丛的半正性、nef性和bigness之间的关系，特别关注二维情况，证明了Grauert例子中的线丛是nef且big但不是半正定的。
AI.motivation: 研究紧致Kähler流形上线丛的半正性、nef性和bigness之间的关系，特别是验证Filip和Tosatti猜想在二维情况下的情形。已知在一维情况下，nef且big的线丛总是正的，但在三维及以上维度存在反例，二维情况成为关键问题。
AI.method: 通过显式计算Grauert例子中线丛的第一障碍类来证明其性质。该障碍类是由Koike引入的Ueda类的推广，用于检测线丛的半正性。
AI.result: 证明了Grauert例子中的线丛是nef且big但不是半正定的，从而在二维情况下也找到了nef且big但不是半正定的反例。
AI.conclusion: 在紧致Kähler流形上，nef且big的线丛不一定半正定，即使在二维情况下也存在这样的反例，这深化了对这些几何性质之间关系的理解。

title: A horofunction counterpart to Teichmüller distance
summary: We generalize the horofunction compactification to maps that are not distance functions. As an application we define a horofunction counterpart to the Teichmüller distance, and discuss its properties.

AI.tldr: 将horofunction紧化推广到非距离函数，并应用于Teichmüller距离的horofunction对应物
AI.motivation: 传统的horofunction紧化主要针对距离函数，本文旨在将其推广到更一般的函数类型，特别是为了研究Teichmüller空间的几何结构
AI.method: 将horofunction紧化的概念从距离函数推广到更一般的函数类，然后将其应用于Teichmüller距离，构造相应的horofunction对应物
AI.result: 成功定义了Teichmüller距离的horofunction对应物，并讨论了其基本性质，扩展了horofunction紧化的适用范围
AI.conclusion: 该方法为研究Teichmüller空间和其他几何结构的边界提供了新的工具，扩展了horofunction紧化的理论框架

title: Bethe subspaces and wonderful models for toric arrangements
summary: We study the family of commutative subspaces in the trigonometric holonomy Lie algebra $t^{\mathrm{trig}}_Φ$, introduced by Toledano Laredo, for an arbitrary root system $Φ$. We call these subspaces \emph{Bethe subspaces} because they can be regarded as quadratic components of \emph{Bethe subalgebras} in the Yangian corresponding to the root system $Φ$, that are responsible for integrals of the generalized XXX Heisenberg spin chain. Bethe subspaces are naturally parametrized by the complement of the corresponding toric arrangement . We prove that this family extends regularly to the minimal wonderful model $X_Φ$ of the toric arrangement described by De Concini and Gaiffi, thus giving a compactification of the parameter space for Bethe subspaces. For classical types $A_n, B_n, C_n, D_n$, we show that this extension is faithful. As a special case, when $Φ$ is of type $A_n$, our construction agrees with the main result of Aguirre--Felder--Veselov on the closure of the set of quadratic Gaudin subalgebras. Our work is also closely related to, and refines in this root system setting, a parallel compactification result of J. Peters obtained for more general toric arrangements arising from quantum multiplication on hypertoric varieties. Next, we show that the Bethe subspaces assemble into a vector bundle over $X_Φ$, which we identify with the logarithmic tangent bundle of $X_Φ$. Finally, we formulate conjectures extending these results to the setting of Bethe subalgebras in Yangians and to the quantum cohomology rings of Springer resolutions. We plan to address this in our next papers.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了任意根系Φ的三角全纯李代数中的交换子空间族（Bethe子空间），证明了这些子空间可以正则地扩展到极小wonderful模型X_Φ上，从而给出了Bethe子空间参数空间的紧化。
AI.motivation: 研究Bethe子空间（作为Yangian中Bethe子代数的二次分量）的参数化问题，这些子空间与广义XXX海森堡自旋链的积分密切相关。需要理解这些子空间如何参数化以及参数空间的结构。
AI.method: 将Bethe子空间与三角全纯李代数中的交换子空间联系起来，利用对应的环面排列的补集进行参数化。通过De Concini和Gaiffi描述的极小wonderful模型X_Φ来扩展参数空间，证明这种扩展是正则的。
AI.result: 证明了Bethe子空间族可以正则地扩展到极小wonderful模型X_Φ上，从而给出了参数空间的紧化。对于经典类型A_n, B_n, C_n, D_n，证明这种扩展是忠实的。还证明了Bethe子空间在X_Φ上组装成一个向量丛，并识别为X_Φ的对数切丛。
AI.conclusion: 本文建立了Bethe子空间参数化与极小wonderful模型之间的深刻联系，为Yangian中Bethe子代数和Springer解消的量子上同调环的类似研究奠定了基础，并提出了进一步研究的猜想。

title: Quantum Invariants and Fiberedness
summary:
We explore the topological significance of the knot two-variable series $F_K$, proposed by Gukov--Manolescu and defined by Park for a class of `nice' knots. We show that the leading coefficient of $F_K$ is a monomial and express its exponent in terms of the Hopf invariant for all homogeneous braid knots and fibered knots up to 12 crossings. As an application, we deduce an explicit formula for the Hopf invariant in terms of colored Jones polynomials.
  For non-fibered strongly quasipositive knots, we study a relation between $F_K$ and the stability series of the colored Jones function, and explore similarities between $F_K$ and knot Floer homology. Finally, we propose a slope conjecture for $F_K$, relating it to the boundary slopes of the knot.

AI.tldr: 研究Gukov-Manolescu提出的纽结双变量级数F_K的拓扑意义，分析其首项系数与Hopf不变量的关系，并探索F_K与彩色Jones多项式、纽结Floer同调的联系。
AI.motivation: 探索Gukov-Manolescu提出的纽结双变量级数F_K的拓扑意义，理解其与纽结拓扑不变量之间的关系，特别是与Hopf不变量、彩色Jones多项式、纽结Floer同调的联系。
AI.method: 1. 证明F_K的首项系数是单项式，并用Hopf不变量表示其指数；2. 对所有齐次辫子纽结和12交叉点以内的纤维化纽结进行计算验证；3. 研究非纤维化强拟正纽结中F_K与彩色Jones函数稳定性级数的关系；4. 探索F_K与纽结Floer同调的相似性；5. 提出F_K的斜率猜想。
AI.result: 1. 证明了F_K的首项系数是单项式，其指数可以用Hopf不变量表示；2. 推导出用彩色Jones多项式表达Hopf不变量的显式公式；3. 发现了F_K与彩色Jones函数稳定性级数之间的关系；4. 观察到F_K与纽结Floer同调的相似性；5. 提出了将F_K与纽结边界斜率联系起来的斜率猜想。
AI.conclusion: F_K级数具有重要的拓扑意义，其首项系数与Hopf不变量密切相关，并且与彩色Jones多项式、纽结Floer同调等经典不变量存在深刻联系，为进一步研究纽结拓扑不变量提供了新的视角和工具。

title: Families of cyclic curve coverings with maximal monodromy
summary: We study the algebraic monodromy of families of cyclic Galois coverings of curves. Under a condition on the $G$-decomposition of the associated variation of Hodge structures, we prove a criterion for the maximality of the monodromy. The proof combines the genus-zero case with a degeneration argument involving Prym varieties of certain admissible coverings. As a consequence of our criterion, we show that for $g\geq 8$ there exists no special family of Galois covers of the type we consider, providing new evidence towards the Coleman-Oort conjecture. Finally, we determine when the loci of double and triple Galois covers are totally geodesic.

AI.tldr: 研究曲线循环伽罗瓦覆盖族的代数单值群，证明单值群最大性准则，提供Coleman-Oort猜想新证据，确定二重三重伽罗瓦覆盖轨迹何时完全测地
AI.motivation: 研究曲线循环伽罗瓦覆盖族的代数单值群性质，旨在理解这类覆盖族的几何和算术特性，并为Coleman-Oort猜想提供新证据
AI.method: 结合亏格为零的情况与涉及特定容许覆盖的Prym簇的退化论证，在相关Hodge结构变体的G-分解条件下证明单值群最大性准则
AI.result: 证明了单值群最大性准则，发现当g≥8时不存在所考虑类型的特殊伽罗瓦覆盖族，确定了二重三重伽罗瓦覆盖轨迹完全测地的条件
AI.conclusion: 该研究为Coleman-Oort猜想提供了新证据，建立了伽罗瓦覆盖族单值群最大性的判别准则，并完全刻画了二重三重伽罗瓦覆盖轨迹的完全测地性

title: Defect of projective hypersurfaces with isolated singularities
summary: Let $X$ be a hypersurface with isolated singularities defined by $f$ in ${\bf P^{n+1}}$ with $n>1$. The difference ${\rm def}(X):=h^{n+1}(X)-h^{n-1}(X)$ is called the defect of $X$ (for self-duality of the cohomology of $X$). It is known that its vanishing is closely related to ${\bf Q}$-factoriality of $X$ in the rational singularity case with $n=3$. This number coincides with the dimension of the cokernel of the inclusion $H^{n-1}(X)\to{\rm IH}^{n-1}(X)$, the rank of the morphism from the vanishing cohomologies of $X$ to $H^{n+1}(X)$ for a one-parameter smoothing of $X$ with total space smooth, and also with the dimension of the unipotent monodromy part of the Milnor fiber cohomology of $f$ with degree $n$. In the case $X$ has only weighted homogeneous isolated singularities, the defect ${\rm def}(X)$ is then given by the $E_2$-term of the spectral sequence of the double complex with differentials ${\rm d}f\wedge$ and $\rm d$ by the $E_2$-degeneration of the pole order spectral sequence. It can be calculated explicitly using a computer even for analogues of the Hirzebruch quintic threefold with more than one hundred ordinary double points found by B.\ van Geemen and J.\ Werner in a compatible way with their computation. We give also an example with ${\rm def}(X)>0$ and $|{\rm Sing}\,X|=1$ where $n=3$.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了具有孤立奇点的超曲面X的缺陷(defect)概念，探讨了其与Q-因子性、消失上同调、单能单值性等几何性质的关系，并给出了具体计算方法。
AI.motivation: 研究超曲面缺陷概念的动机在于理解其与多种几何性质的联系：包括自对偶性、Q-因子性、消失上同调、单能单值性等，这些联系在奇点理论和代数几何中具有重要意义。
AI.method: 通过分析缺陷的多种等价定义：作为上同调维数差、包含映射的余核维数、消失上同调到高阶上同调的秩、以及单能单值部分维数。对于加权齐次孤立奇点情况，利用极阶谱序列的E2-退化，通过双复形的E2项计算缺陷。
AI.result: 证明了缺陷概念的多重等价性，提供了显式计算缺陷的方法（可通过计算机实现），给出了def(X)>0且只有一个奇点的三维例子，验证了与van Geemen和Werner关于Hirzebruch五次三维流形计算的兼容性。
AI.conclusion: 缺陷是一个连接超曲面多种几何性质的重要不变量，对于加权齐次孤立奇点情况有显式计算方法，其非零性揭示了奇点结构的重要信息，特别是在三维情况下与Q-因子性的关系。

title: An overview on curve semistable and numerically flat Higgs bundles
summary: After recalling the basic notions concerning Higgs-Grassmannian schemes, I review how these latter can be used to define generalisations of the notion of positivity conditions, such as numerically flatness, which "feel" the Higgs field. Then I prove several properties of Higgs bundles, over smooth projective varieties defined over an algebraically closed field of characteristic $0$, satisfying these conditions. Finally, I discuss how one can relate them to semistability of the so-called "curve semistable" Higgs bundles.

AI.tldr: 论文回顾了Higgs-Grassmannian schemes的基本概念，并利用它们定义了能"感知"Higgs场的正性条件推广（如数值平坦性），证明了满足这些条件的Higgs bundle的性质，并讨论了它们与"曲线半稳定"Higgs bundle半稳定性的关系。
AI.motivation: 研究Higgs bundle的正性条件推广，特别是能反映Higgs场特性的数值平坦性等概念，以更好地理解Higgs bundle的几何性质及其与半稳定性的关系。
AI.method: 首先回顾Higgs-Grassmannian schemes的基本概念，然后利用这些schemes定义广义的正性条件（如数值平坦性），接着在特征0的代数闭域上的光滑射影簇上，证明满足这些条件的Higgs bundle的若干性质，最后讨论它们与"曲线半稳定"Higgs bundle半稳定性的联系。
AI.result: 建立了Higgs bundle的广义正性条件理论框架，证明了满足这些条件的Higgs bundle的重要性质，并建立了这些正性条件与曲线半稳定Higgs bundle半稳定性之间的关联。
AI.conclusion: 通过Higgs-Grassmannian schemes定义的正性条件为研究Higgs bundle提供了新的工具，这些条件不仅推广了经典概念，还能更好地反映Higgs场的特性，并与半稳定性理论建立了有意义的联系。

title: On the origin of the Jacobian conjecture
summary: The Jacobian conjecture is thought to have been proposed by O. H. Keller in 1939. However, we have found that the statement of the conjecture is precisely the main result of a paper published by L. Kraus in 1884. Although the final step of Kraus's proof is flawed, the ideas he introduced anticipated approaches to the problem that would only emerge more than a century later. Interestingly, the root of Kraus's error remains the principal obstacle to algebro-geometric approaches: controlling the ramification at infinity.

AI.tldr: 该论文发现雅可比猜想实际上在1884年由L. Kraus提出，比公认的1939年早了55年，尽管Kraus的证明存在错误，但他的思想预见了后来的研究方法。
AI.motivation: 重新审视雅可比猜想的起源，揭示该猜想实际上比公认时间早半个多世纪就被提出，并分析早期证明尝试中的思想价值。
